subject: Stem Cells
Medicine and Health
lead_paragraph: Some doctors and researchers say that in a few years the use of stem cells could grow new knee ligaments or elbow tendons, creating a therapy that becomes the vanguard of sports injury repair.
snippet: Some doctors and researchers say that in a few years the use of stem cells could grow new knee ligaments or elbow tendons, creating a therapy that becomes the vanguard of sports injury repair.
